request.payloadData: {"fields":{"cafeName":{"en-US":"Espresso Mafia"},"authorName":{"en-US":"Chris Jordan"},"publishDate":{"en-US":"2025-09-04"},"slug":{"en-US":"espresso-mafia-cort-reial"},"excerpt":{"en-US":"A minimalist specialty coffee bar in Girona known for its expertly roasted beans and Scandinavian-inspired design."},"instagramLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/espresso_mafia/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Instagram","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"facebookLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.facebook.com/espresso.mafia.girona/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Facebook","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"overallScore":{"en-US":8.3},"coffeeScore":{"en-US":8.5},"atmosphereScore":{"en-US":8},"serviceScore":{"en-US":8.5},"foodScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeDescription":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The space radiates calm with its clean lines, pale woods, and abundant natural light. It’s the kind of place where you can lose track of time while people-watching or catching up with friends. The ambiance feels both quietly sophisticated and effortlessly welcoming.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"theStory":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Born out of a passion for elevating Girona’s coffee scene, this cafe set out to introduce specialty roasting and third-wave sensibilities to the historic city center. Over the years, it has become a local landmark for coffee lovers and cyclists alike, drawing a diverse crowd from across the globe. Their commitment to quality and transparency has helped foster a vibrant community around the craft of coffee. With a focus on sustainability and education, the cafe continues to inspire both regulars and newcomers with every cup.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"craftExpertise":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Precision is evident in every shot pulled, with beans roasted in-house to highlight origin character and sweetness. Baristas are highly skilled, offering expert recommendations and executing pour-overs and espresso drinks with consistent excellence. The menu features modern classics and rotating single-origin options, served in minimalist ceramics that complement the aesthetic. Seating is a mix of communal tables and window-facing stools, perfect for solo visits or small groups. Light pastries and baked goods round out the experience, always fresh and thoughtfully sourced.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"setsApart":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A dedication to minimalist design sets this cafe apart, creating a serene environment rarely found in bustling city centers. Their in-house roasting program ensures unmatched freshness and a direct connection to the coffee’s journey. The blend of Scandinavian-inspired aesthetics with Girona’s old-world charm makes for a truly memorable setting. Whether you’re a specialty coffee aficionado or just seeking a peaceful retreat, this spot stands out for its clarity of vision and execution.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"cafeAddress":{"en-US":"Carrer de la Cort Reial, 5, 17004 Girona, Spain"},"cityReference":{"en-US":{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"5s8tNLI7gtUSz0kDpPVPQn"}}},"cafeLatLon":{"en-US":{"lat":41.9846498,"lon":2.8250666}},"placeId":{"en-US":"ChIJ7W76d-fmuhIRorDQBMvrQsQ"}}}

request.payloadData: {"fields":{"cafeName":{"en-US":"La Fabrica"},"authorName":{"en-US":"Chris Jordan"},"publishDate":{"en-US":"2025-09-04"},"slug":{"en-US":"la-fabrica-llebre"},"excerpt":{"en-US":"Cyclist-founded third wave cafe with a lively community spirit, single-origin coffees, and a standout healthy brunch menu."},"instagramLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/lafabricagirona/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Instagram","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"facebookLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.facebook.com/lafabricagirona/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Facebook","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"overallScore":{"en-US":8.3},"coffeeScore":{"en-US":8.5},"atmosphereScore":{"en-US":8},"serviceScore":{"en-US":8.5},"foodScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeDescription":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"La Fabrica buzzes with the energy of cyclists and locals mingling in a bright, welcoming space. Exposed brick, eclectic decor, and a steady hum of conversation give it a warm, communal feel. It’s the kind of spot where you instantly feel part of Girona’s vibrant coffee-loving crowd.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"theStory":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Founded by passionate cyclists, this cafe was born from a desire to create a hub where community and specialty coffee intersect. Over the years, it has become a meeting point for athletes, locals, and visitors drawn to Girona’s unique culture. The team’s mission is to foster healthy living and genuine connection through quality food and coffee. Their impact is felt beyond the cafe, inspiring a broader movement of wellness and community in the city.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"craftExpertise":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Single-origin beans are the backbone of the menu, brewed with precision on well-maintained equipment by knowledgeable baristas. The espresso is consistently balanced, with a rotating selection of filter options for those seeking nuance. Pour-overs are served in elegant glassware, and the milk texturing is reliably silky for lattes and flat whites. The brunch menu complements the coffee, featuring wholesome, vibrant dishes that cater to a range of diets. Seating is a mix of communal tables and cozy nooks, perfect for groups or solo visitors.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"setsApart":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The strong connection to Girona’s cycling culture gives the cafe a unique sense of purpose and identity. Its dedication to healthy, flavorful food alongside specialty coffee sets it apart from more traditional cafes. The space is designed to encourage interaction, with a welcoming attitude towards both regulars and newcomers. Whether you arrive in cycling gear or street clothes, you’ll find a place that feels both international and distinctly local.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"cafeAddress":{"en-US":"Carrer de la Llebre, 3, 17004 Girona, Spain"},"cityReference":{"en-US":{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"5s8tNLI7gtUSz0kDpPVPQn"}}},"cafeLatLon":{"en-US":{"lat":41.983936,"lon":2.825969}},"placeId":{"en-US":"ChIJn6g8Y93muhIRxTzYjdBD39M"}}}

request.payloadData: {"fields":{"cafeName":{"en-US":"La Comuna"},"authorName":{"en-US":"Chris Jordan"},"publishDate":{"en-US":"2025-09-04"},"slug":{"en-US":"la-comuna-carme"},"excerpt":{"en-US":"A chic, modern coffee shop in Girona celebrated for its specialty brews and eco-conscious ethos."},"instagramLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/lacomunagirona/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Instagram","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"facebookLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.facebook.com/lacomunagirona/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Facebook","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"overallScore":{"en-US":8.3},"coffeeScore":{"en-US":8.5},"atmosphereScore":{"en-US":8},"serviceScore":{"en-US":8},"foodScore":{"en-US":8.5},"vibeScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeDescription":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The space feels effortlessly cool, blending clean lines with warm, inviting touches. It’s the kind of place where creative energy buzzes and conversations flow easily among friends and locals. Whether you’re working solo or catching up with a group, the ambiance is both relaxed and inspiring.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"theStory":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Inspired by a passion for community and sustainability, this cafe was founded to bring specialty coffee culture to Girona with a conscience. From the outset, its mission has been to create a welcoming space that champions ethical sourcing and environmental responsibility. Over the years, it has become a local hub for those who appreciate both quality and purpose. Their ongoing commitment to reducing waste and supporting local producers continues to set standards in the city.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"craftExpertise":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Baristas here demonstrate a clear mastery of their craft, showcasing beans from top Spanish and European roasters with precision and care. Espresso drinks are consistently balanced and nuanced, while filter options rotate to highlight seasonal origins. The oat flat white is a standout, and even the cold brew is meticulously extracted for clarity and sweetness. Drinks are served in minimalist ceramics, and there’s ample seating for both laptop dwellers and casual meetups. Their food menu, featuring fresh pastries and inventive brunch plates, complements the coffee experience beautifully.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"setsApart":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A steadfast commitment to sustainability permeates every aspect, from zero-waste initiatives to biodegradable packaging and locally sourced ingredients. The design is strikingly modern yet comfortable, with an open layout that encourages community interaction. Their transparent approach to sourcing and environmental impact is rare among cafes in the region. Memorable for both its ethical stance and its vibrant, design-forward atmosphere, it stands out as a true destination for conscious coffee lovers.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"cafeAddress":{"en-US":"Carrer del Carme, 31, 17004 Girona, Spain"},"cityReference":{"en-US":{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"5s8tNLI7gtUSz0kDpPVPQn"}}},"cafeLatLon":{"en-US":{"lat":41.9798449,"lon":2.8244982}},"placeId":{"en-US":"ChIJ6w00KqXnuhIRjPy1As29M9c"}}}

request.payloadData: {"fields":{"cafeName":{"en-US":"Federal Café"},"authorName":{"en-US":"Chris Jordan"},"publishDate":{"en-US":"2025-09-04"},"slug":{"en-US":"federal-cafe-forca"},"excerpt":{"en-US":"A bright, Australian-inspired café in Girona serving expertly crafted espresso drinks and modern brunch fare."},"instagramLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/federalcafegirona/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Instagram","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"facebookLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.facebook.com/federalcafegirona/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Facebook","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"overallScore":{"en-US":8.3},"coffeeScore":{"en-US":8.5},"atmosphereScore":{"en-US":8.5},"serviceScore":{"en-US":8},"foodScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeDescription":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Flooded with natural light and filled with leafy plants, this café exudes a relaxed and cosmopolitan charm. The open, minimalist design invites you to linger, whether you’re working solo or catching up with friends. It’s the kind of place where the energy feels effortlessly cool and welcoming.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"theStory":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Inspired by the laid-back café culture of Australia, this spot set out to bring a fresh perspective to Girona’s coffee scene. From its opening, it quickly became a favorite for both locals and travelers seeking a modern, inclusive gathering place. The café’s mission is to blend quality, design, and community, offering a space that feels both international and distinctly local. Over the years, it has helped shape Girona’s brunch and specialty coffee culture, becoming a touchstone for contemporary café experiences in the city.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"craftExpertise":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Espresso drinks here are consistently dialed in, with balanced extraction and silky milk texturing that showcase the baristas’ skill. The menu features both classic options and inventive specials, often spotlighting single-origin beans and seasonal flavors. Pour-over and batch brew are available for filter enthusiasts, served in elegant glassware that elevates the experience. Food is prepared with the same attention to quality, from vibrant avocado toast to hearty brunch plates. Seating is thoughtfully arranged for both intimate chats and communal gatherings, making every visit feel tailored and comfortable.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"setsApart":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What truly distinguishes this café is its seamless blend of Australian café ethos with Girona’s historic charm. The design is both modern and inviting, with large windows and natural materials creating an airy, urban oasis. Their commitment to quality—whether in coffee, food, or service—is evident in every detail. It’s a destination that feels both globally inspired and uniquely rooted in its local context.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"cafeAddress":{"en-US":"Carrer de la Força, 9, 17004 Girona, Spain"},"cityReference":{"en-US":{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"5s8tNLI7gtUSz0kDpPVPQn"}}},"cafeLatLon":{"en-US":{"lat":41.9856762,"lon":2.8251119}},"placeId":{"en-US":"ChIJJQeKCefmuhIR3LiQ8v4eWGg"}}}

request.payloadData: {"fields":{"cafeName":{"en-US":"Coffee & Greens"},"authorName":{"en-US":"Chris Jordan"},"publishDate":{"en-US":"2025-09-04"},"slug":{"en-US":"coffee-greens-barca"},"excerpt":{"en-US":"A lush, inviting café in Girona offering expertly brewed specialty coffee and nourishing, locally sourced fare."},"instagramLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/coffeeandgreensgirona"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Instagram","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"facebookLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.facebook.com/coffeeandgreensgirona"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Facebook","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"overallScore":{"en-US":8.3},"coffeeScore":{"en-US":8.5},"atmosphereScore":{"en-US":8.5},"serviceScore":{"en-US":8},"foodScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeDescription":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Stepping inside feels like entering a tranquil urban greenhouse, with sunlight filtering through leafy plants and cozy nooks inviting you to linger. The relaxed, friendly energy makes it easy to unwind, whether you're reading, working, or chatting with friends. It's the kind of place where time slows down and every visit feels restorative.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"theStory":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Born from a passion for both specialty coffee and sustainable living, this café set out to create a community hub centered around quality and well-being. Over the years, it has become a favorite among locals and travelers alike for its commitment to fresh, locally sourced ingredients and mindful hospitality. The team has continued to evolve its offerings, introducing seasonal menus and collaborating with local producers. Their vision extends beyond just great coffee, aiming to nurture a culture of connection and conscious consumption in Girona.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"craftExpertise":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Baristas here demonstrate a clear mastery of their craft, consistently delivering balanced, nuanced espresso and filter brews using beans from top Spanish roasters. Attention to detail is evident in every cup, from precise extraction to beautiful latte art. The menu features both classic espresso-based drinks and inventive seasonal specials, with plant-based milks seamlessly integrated. Drinks are served in a mix of elegant ceramics and glassware, enhancing the sensory experience. The food menu complements the coffee, with wholesome options that showcase local produce and thoughtful presentation.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"setsApart":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The lush, plant-filled interior creates a calming oasis that stands out from Girona's more traditional cafés. Their dedication to sustainability is reflected in everything from compostable packaging to partnerships with local farmers. The menu’s focus on healthful, seasonal food alongside specialty coffee makes it a destination for both wellness enthusiasts and coffee aficionados. Memorable touches—like a rotating display of local art and regular community events—foster a sense of belonging and discovery.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"cafeAddress":{"en-US":"Carrer de la Barca, 31, 17004 Girona, Spain"},"cityReference":{"en-US":{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"5s8tNLI7gtUSz0kDpPVPQn"}}},"cafeLatLon":{"en-US":{"lat":41.989143,"lon":2.8248257}},"placeId":{"en-US":"ChIJn6g8Y93muhIRxTzYjdBD39M"}}}

request.payloadData: {"fields":{"cafeName":{"en-US":"Oniria"},"authorName":{"en-US":"Chris Jordan"},"publishDate":{"en-US":"2025-09-04"},"slug":{"en-US":"oniria-rutlla"},"excerpt":{"en-US":"A boutique specialty coffee shop in Girona with a creative spirit and a passion for quality beans."},"instagramLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/oniria.coffee/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Instagram","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"facebookLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.facebook.com/oniriacoffee/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Facebook","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"overallScore":{"en-US":8.3},"coffeeScore":{"en-US":8.5},"atmosphereScore":{"en-US":8},"serviceScore":{"en-US":8.5},"foodScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeDescription":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Oniria feels like a creative hideaway, where clean lines and gentle lighting invite you to slow down and savor the moment. The space buzzes with quiet energy, making it ideal for both solo reflection and relaxed conversation. There’s a welcoming, unpretentious warmth that makes you want to linger with your cup.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"theStory":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Inspired by a love for specialty coffee and a desire to share new brewing experiences with Girona, this boutique shop opened its doors with a mission to elevate local coffee culture. Over the years, it has become a gathering spot for both aficionados and curious newcomers, earning a reputation for thoughtful curation and creative flair. The team is dedicated to sourcing ethically and showcasing the full potential of every bean. Their vision is to foster community through quality, transparency, and a genuine passion for the craft.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"craftExpertise":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Precision is at the heart of the coffee experience here, with beans sourced from top European roasters and brewed using a variety of methods from V60 to AeroPress. The baristas demonstrate deep knowledge and enthusiasm, guiding guests through tasting notes and recommending unique single origins. Signature drinks often rotate, with inventive seasonal specials and meticulous latte art. The seating is a mix of cozy corners and communal tables, and drinks are served in elegant ceramics that enhance the sensory experience. Fresh pastries and light bites complement the drinks, rounding out a well-considered menu.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"setsApart":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What makes this cafe stand out is its commitment to creative brewing and a genuine sense of hospitality. The minimalist yet inviting design sets a calming tone, while the rotating menu of beans keeps every visit fresh and exciting. Their approach to education—whether through tasting flights or friendly explanations—makes specialty coffee accessible to all. The result is a memorable space that feels both modern and deeply personal.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"cafeAddress":{"en-US":"Carrer de la Rutlla, 15, 17002 Girona, Spain"},"cityReference":{"en-US":{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"5s8tNLI7gtUSz0kDpPVPQn"}}},"cafeLatLon":{"en-US":{"lat":41.97784,"lon":2.823328}},"placeId":{"en-US":"ChIJ1_UbRAHnuhIRGMnX3c5l6CM"}}}

request.payloadData: {"fields":{"cafeName":{"en-US":"El Pessic"},"authorName":{"en-US":"Chris Jordan"},"publishDate":{"en-US":"2025-09-04"},"slug":{"en-US":"el-pessic-forca"},"excerpt":{"en-US":"A cozy artisan café in Girona’s old quarter, known for specialty coffee, homemade pastries, and an artsy, welcoming vibe."},"instagramLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/elpessicgirona"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Instagram","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"facebookLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.facebook.com/elpessicgirona"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Facebook","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"overallScore":{"en-US":8.3},"coffeeScore":{"en-US":8.5},"atmosphereScore":{"en-US":8.5},"serviceScore":{"en-US":8},"foodScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeDescription":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"El Pessic radiates a relaxed, creative energy that makes you want to linger. The walls are adorned with local art, and soft indie music sets a mellow tone for conversation or quiet reflection. It’s the kind of spot where locals and travelers alike feel instantly at home.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"theStory":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Founded by passionate artisans in Girona’s historic heart, this café was born from a desire to blend specialty coffee culture with a love for homemade baking. Over the years, it has become a beloved gathering place for the city’s creative community, hosting art displays and small events. Their mission centers on fostering genuine connections—between people, art, and the craft of coffee. The café’s continued commitment to quality and local collaboration has made it a staple in Girona’s vibrant café scene.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"craftExpertise":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Baristas here demonstrate a clear passion for their craft, carefully dialing in each espresso shot and offering expert recommendations for both filter and milk-based drinks. Beans are sourced from respected Spanish roasters, with a rotating selection that highlights both classic and seasonal profiles. Pour-overs are prepared with precision, and the latte art is consistently impressive. Drinks are served in charming ceramics, with seating ranging from window nooks to communal tables, all inviting you to savor the experience alongside their fresh pastries. The food menu, though concise, is thoughtfully curated to complement the coffee.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"setsApart":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What truly distinguishes El Pessic is its seamless fusion of artisan coffee culture with a vibrant arts scene. The café regularly showcases local artists and craftspeople, making each visit feel like a new discovery. Their dedication to homemade pastries, made fresh daily, adds a personal touch rarely matched elsewhere in Girona. The atmosphere is both inspiring and unpretentious, making it a memorable stop for anyone seeking more than just a caffeine fix.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"cafeAddress":{"en-US":"Carrer de la Força, 15, 17004 Girona, Spain"},"cityReference":{"en-US":{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"5s8tNLI7gtUSz0kDpPVPQn"}}},"cafeLatLon":{"en-US":{"lat":41.9860992,"lon":2.8251675}},"placeId":{"en-US":"ChIJjwMNzN3muhIR9gsMnK3ITFk"}}}

request.payloadData: {"fields":{"cafeName":{"en-US":"Sibèria Café"},"authorName":{"en-US":"Chris Jordan"},"publishDate":{"en-US":"2025-09-04"},"slug":{"en-US":"siberia-cafe-rutlla"},"excerpt":{"en-US":"A welcoming neighborhood café in Girona serving expertly crafted espresso in a laid-back, friendly setting."},"instagramLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/siberiacafe.girona"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Instagram","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"facebookLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.facebook.com/siberiacafegirona"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Facebook","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"overallScore":{"en-US":8.1},"coffeeScore":{"en-US":8.5},"atmosphereScore":{"en-US":8},"serviceScore":{"en-US":8},"foodScore":{"en-US":7.8},"vibeScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeDescription":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Sibèria Café exudes a relaxed, easygoing charm that immediately makes you feel at home. Locals and visitors mingle comfortably, sharing conversations or quiet moments over coffee. The space feels like a true neighborhood hub, where genuine warmth and friendliness are always on the menu.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"theStory":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Born from a desire to create a gathering place for Girona’s coffee lovers, this café has steadily become a cornerstone of the local community. Over the years, it has earned a loyal following by focusing on quality and hospitality, always striving to offer a personal touch. Their mission is to make specialty coffee accessible and enjoyable for everyone, fostering connections and everyday rituals. The café’s commitment to inclusivity and neighborhood spirit shines through in every detail, from the welcoming décor to their involvement in local events.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"craftExpertise":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Baristas here demonstrate a true passion for their craft, pulling consistently balanced espresso shots and expertly steaming milk for smooth, creamy textures. The menu highlights both classic espresso drinks and occasional seasonal specials, all served in elegant glassware or sturdy ceramics. Attention to detail is evident in each cup, from precise grind adjustments to thoughtful presentation. Seating is a mix of cozy tables and window spots, ideal for lingering over a cortado or a house-made pastry. The food selection, though concise, complements the coffee with fresh, quality ingredients and inviting flavors.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"setsApart":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What truly distinguishes Sibèria Café is its genuine neighborhood feel and the sense of belonging it fosters among regulars and newcomers alike. The design is unpretentious yet thoughtfully curated, blending comfort with subtle style. Their approach to coffee is rooted in expertise but always approachable, making specialty drinks feel accessible rather than intimidating. The café’s consistent quality and welcoming atmosphere leave a lasting impression, making it a must-visit in Girona’s café scene.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"cafeAddress":{"en-US":"Carrer de la Rutlla, 24, 17002 Girona, Spain"},"cityReference":{"en-US":{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"5s8tNLI7gtUSz0kDpPVPQn"}}},"cafeLatLon":{"en-US":{"lat":41.9781396,"lon":2.8233628}},"placeId":{"en-US":"ChIJn6g8Y93muhIRxTzYjdBD39M"}}}

request.payloadData: {"fields":{"cafeName":{"en-US":"Bionbo Café Gastrobar"},"authorName":{"en-US":"Chris Jordan"},"publishDate":{"en-US":"2025-09-04"},"slug":{"en-US":"bionbo-cafe-gastrobar-carme"},"excerpt":{"en-US":"A stylish Girona café serving specialty coffee and creative brunch in a modern, inviting setting."},"instagramLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/bionbogastrobar/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Instagram","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"facebookLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.facebook.com/bionbogastrobar/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Facebook","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"overallScore":{"en-US":8.3},"coffeeScore":{"en-US":8},"atmosphereScore":{"en-US":8.5},"serviceScore":{"en-US":8.5},"foodScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeDescription":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Bionbo Café Gastrobar radiates a laid-back yet cosmopolitan energy, making it a favorite for both locals and travelers. The modern décor and natural light create a space that feels fresh, social, and effortlessly stylish. It’s the kind of place where you want to linger over brunch or catch up with friends in a vibrant, welcoming atmosphere.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"theStory":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Founded with a vision to bring inventive, health-conscious cuisine and specialty coffee to Girona, this café has quickly become a local institution. Its dedication to fresh ingredients and creative brunch concepts has earned it a loyal following and critical acclaim. Over the years, the team has expanded their menu and refined their approach, always striving to offer something new and memorable. Their broader mission is to foster community and elevate everyday dining with a modern, sustainable touch.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"craftExpertise":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The baristas here take their craft seriously, expertly dialing in espresso shots and offering a rotating selection of single-origin beans. Pour-overs are prepared with precision, and the milk texturing for flat whites and cappuccinos consistently delivers silky results. Creative signature drinks, like their house-made cold brews and seasonal lattes, showcase both skill and imagination. Drinks are served in elegant, modern cups, complementing the café’s contemporary seating and open layout. The food menu, with its inventive twists on brunch classics, pairs seamlessly with the coffee experience.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"setsApart":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What truly distinguishes this café is its seamless blend of gourmet brunch and specialty coffee in a space that feels both urban and inviting. The focus on fresh, locally sourced ingredients and a menu that changes with the seasons keeps regulars coming back for new surprises. Design-wise, the café stands out with its clean lines, abundant greenery, and warm lighting. The commitment to sustainability and community engagement further sets it apart from more conventional spots in Girona.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"cafeAddress":{"en-US":"Carrer del Carme, 7, 17004 Girona, Spain"},"cityReference":{"en-US":{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"5s8tNLI7gtUSz0kDpPVPQn"}}},"cafeLatLon":{"en-US":{"lat":41.9788076,"lon":2.8245563}},"placeId":{"en-US":"ChIJX0foltvmuhIRHpyx7Qu4jZ8"}}}

request.payloadData: {"fields":{"cafeName":{"en-US":"St. Graal"},"authorName":{"en-US":"Chris Jordan"},"publishDate":{"en-US":"2025-09-04"},"slug":{"en-US":"st-graal-forca"},"excerpt":{"en-US":"An intimate specialty coffee shop in Girona, St. Graal is renowned for its precise brewing and curated selection of beans."},"instagramLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/stgraal.coffee/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Instagram","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"facebookLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.facebook.com/stgraal.coffee"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Facebook","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"overallScore":{"en-US":8.5},"coffeeScore":{"en-US":9},"atmosphereScore":{"en-US":8},"serviceScore":{"en-US":8.5},"foodScore":{"en-US":8.5},"vibeScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeDescription":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The space feels quietly refined, inviting you to slow down and savor the moment. Soft lighting and minimalist decor create a sense of calm that’s perfect for conversation or contemplation. It’s the kind of place where you can genuinely unwind and feel at home amidst the gentle hum of Girona’s old town.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"theStory":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Born from a passion for elevating Girona’s coffee culture, this cafe set out to create a haven for true specialty coffee appreciation. Since opening its doors, it has become a destination for locals and travelers seeking a thoughtful, quality-driven experience. The team’s dedication to sourcing and education has helped shape the city’s modern coffee scene. Their vision extends beyond the cup, aiming to foster a deeper connection between guests, growers, and the craft itself.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"craftExpertise":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Precision is at the heart of every cup, with baristas who approach each brew method—be it V60, AeroPress, or espresso—with meticulous care. The rotating selection of beans is always thoughtfully sourced, often featuring limited micro-lots and rare origins. Presentation is elevated, with drinks served in elegant ceramics that enhance both aroma and temperature. Seating is intimate but comfortable, encouraging focus on the sensory experience. The concise menu also includes expertly crafted non-coffee options and a small array of fresh, high-quality pastries.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"setsApart":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What truly distinguishes this spot is its unwavering commitment to coffee purity and education—every detail, from water quality to grind size, is intentional. The curated bean selection changes frequently, ensuring each visit offers something new for the curious palate. Its minimalist design and tranquil ambiance contrast beautifully with the bustling historic street outside, making it a sanctuary for enthusiasts. The experience feels personal and memorable, elevating it well above the average specialty cafe.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"cafeAddress":{"en-US":"Carrer de la Força, 10, 17004 Girona, Spain"},"cityReference":{"en-US":{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"5s8tNLI7gtUSz0kDpPVPQn"}}},"cafeLatLon":{"en-US":{"lat":41.9861503,"lon":2.8252488}},"placeId":{"en-US":"ChIJe7qVrefmuhIRRsBJ5H3tT28"}}}

request.payloadData: {"fields":{"cafeName":{"en-US":"Buttercup"},"authorName":{"en-US":"Chris Jordan"},"publishDate":{"en-US":"2025-09-04"},"slug":{"en-US":"buttercup-rutlla"},"excerpt":{"en-US":"A cozy Girona café serving specialty coffee and homemade cakes in a charming, welcoming space."},"instagramLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/buttercupgirona/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Instagram","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"facebookLink":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.facebook.com/buttercupgirona/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Facebook","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}},"overallScore":{"en-US":8.3},"coffeeScore":{"en-US":8},"atmosphereScore":{"en-US":8.5},"serviceScore":{"en-US":8.5},"foodScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeScore":{"en-US":8},"vibeDescription":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Buttercup feels like a warm embrace the moment you step inside, with soft lighting and gentle music setting a relaxed tone. The cheerful décor and pastel touches create an inviting space perfect for lingering conversations or quiet moments alone. It’s the kind of spot where you instantly feel at home, surrounded by the gentle hum of happy guests.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"theStory":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Inspired by a love for community and handcrafted treats, this café was founded to bring specialty coffee culture and homemade baking to Girona. Over the years, it has become a local favorite, known for its welcoming spirit and consistent quality. The team’s mission is to offer a space where everyone can slow down and savor the moment, whether over a perfect flat white or a slice of cake. Their commitment to hospitality and creativity shines through in every detail, making it a beloved gathering place for locals and visitors alike.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"craftExpertise":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Baristas here demonstrate a genuine passion for their craft, preparing each cup with careful attention to extraction and presentation. The espresso is consistently well-balanced, with a rotating selection of single-origin beans and a creamy microfoam that elevates every milk-based drink. Filter options are available for those seeking a lighter profile, and the house-made cakes pair beautifully with any brew. Drinks are served in elegant ceramics, and seating ranges from cozy nooks to communal tables, encouraging both solitude and connection. The food menu is thoughtfully curated to complement the coffee, emphasizing freshness and homemade quality.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"setsApart":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What truly distinguishes this café is its seamless blend of specialty coffee culture with the warmth of a neighborhood bakery. The homemade cakes, often featuring seasonal ingredients, are a standout and reflect a dedication to quality rarely found elsewhere. The interior design strikes a perfect balance between playful and sophisticated, making it a memorable backdrop for any occasion. Above all, the sense of genuine hospitality and community makes every visit feel special.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}},"cafeAddress":{"en-US":"Carrer de la Rutlla, 40, 17002 Girona, Spain"},"cityReference":{"en-US":{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"5s8tNLI7gtUSz0kDpPVPQn"}}},"cafeLatLon":{"en-US":{"lat":41.9775862,"lon":2.8231155}},"placeId":{"en-US":"ChIJX-hdaxHnuhIRycZT3xegKV4"}}}
